title: Did ya'll forget to make Zoe available???
body:
Or does Riot still like to wait for everyone else to receive the patch before making a new champion available???

EDIT: thanks for the phantom downvotes, what a fantastic feature.

replies.body: so it says shes available to play, but when i click to unlock her, it takes me to the shop. Ive tried typing in her name but i cant find her in the shop. Is she available to play yet?

"Zoe, the Aspect of Twilight, will be released during patch 7.23! In the meantime, learn more about League's next champion:"

Source: https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-723-notes

**During the patch**. Champs are never released day 1 of the patch. Just wait she will be out in a couple of days...
Is the new patch out today?
